subject: Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic luge champion Armin Zoeggeler will not compete in the world championships so that he can be fully recovered from injuries in time for the 2014 Sochi Winter Games.
snippet: The two-time Olympic luge champion Armin Zoeggeler will not compete in the world championships so that he can be fully recovered from injuries in time for the 2014 Sochi Winter Games.
